comment.text: This key displays the label "Open context menu" in the user interface. It appears next to a keyboard shortcut (Shift + c) within the Hotkeys Panel, likely indicating the action triggered by that shortcut. Translators should ensure the translation accurately conveys the action of opening a context menu.

usage.context:
const PreviewActionsBlock = ({ t, textStyles, keyTextStyles }) => {
 return (
 <>
 <Row className="hotkeys_row">
 <>
 <Text {...textStyles}>{t("OpenContextMenu")}</Text>
 <Text {...keyTextStyles}>Shift + c</Text>
 </>
 </Row>
 <Row className="hotkeys_row">
 <>
